body:
So I was playing walls on Scarerow And I with many others were on the Green team And we were stuck in our spawn and if we tried to leave it would say this:
"you may not enter beyond this map's height limit"But we weren't even building so the height limit is on the ground or something. Hopefully someone can get this fixed!
As always,Nebbae

title: Broken walls map

replies.body: It works after the walls drop I just discovered... but before you got no chance..
replies.body_tagged: It works after the walls drop I just discovered... but before you got no chance..

replies.body: Use the edit button next time, btw.
replies.body_tagged: Use the edit button next time, btw.

replies.body: We are aware of this, I think Polar is trying to fix it :)

Yep!
The Map Development is currently much aware of this issue, and we currently are trying to fix it! Thanks for pointing it out though!
